name: live_input_mode

missing_data_behavior.notes: Engine will compensate by adjusting confidence scores.

step_1_clean_text.description: Remove noise, normalize case, strip special characters.

step_2_segment_input.description: Split blocks into analyzable units (sentences, phrases).

step_3_detect_context_flags.description: Look for stress, urgency, emotional volatility indicators.

step_4_generate_signal_packet.description: Pass cleaned text into signal detection layer.

runtime_bridge.description: Passes live signal packets into the runtime harness.

output_delivery.notes: This defines the structure returned to the user after analysis.

safety_rules.notes: Prevents engine overload and ensures text-only input.

notes: Live Input Mode enables real human responses to enter the psychological engine through a clean, validated pathway.
